member.name: M:CsvLoader.Controllers.CsvLoaderController.UploadCsv(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.IFormFile)
member.summary: Upload CSV Files and saves in data base
member.remarks: The CSV file must contain a name, city, country and favorite sport following the example: \ \ name, city, country, favorite_sport \ John Doe,New York, USA, Basketball \ Jane Smith, London, United Kingdom, Football \ Mike Johnson,Paris,France,Tennis \ Karen Lee,Tokyo,Japan,Swimming \ Tom Brown,Sydney,Australia,Racing \ Emma Wilson,Berlin,Germany,Basketball \ \ If there is any repeated data, it will not be saved in the database (a message will be returned with the corresponding duplicated users)

member.name: M:CsvLoader.Controllers.CsvLoaderController.SearchUsers(System.String)
member.summary: Search the uploaded CSV, filtering by a query parameter
member.remarks: The search will be done using case insensitive, bringing all results that contain the sent parameter \ If the search does not find results, it will bring up the message "Users not found"
